comments.body: does this match the intent of the test? I can't tell from the test name.
this is with config  file containing include pattern for json explicitly along with other tsc file include. And json name (index.json) is same as ts file (index.ts)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +2,6 @@/lib/tsc --b /src/tsconfig_withIncludeOfJson.json
error TS5056: Cannot write file '/src/dist/src/index.d.ts' because it would be overwritten by multiple input files.
exitCode:: ExitStatus.DiagnosticsPresent_OutputsSkipped
